4314440.name: Fusil
4314440.description:
Fusil is an action-adventure game where your primary weapon is a rifle and your ammunition is limited. Traverse a mysterious world inspired by the setting of Troika! RPG and choose your own route. Each leg of your journey is a level to explore, where you'll need to uncover hidden passages, interact with locals, and battle hostile creatures. There are multiple ways to complete each level. It's up to you to find the clues and shape your story.

Exploration

  • Non-linear exploration: Every level is an environment that you can freely explore by following your instincts.

  • Utility magic: Learn spells to bypass obstacles, uncover new paths, or find alternative solutions to your objectives.

  • Essential dialogue: Brief interactions with the environment and the world's inhabitants. Gather insights and get right back to the heart of exploration.

Story

  • A strange world: You have plummeted into a mysterious world ruled by mushroom people. Your only priority is to find a way out, but to navigate this bizarre land, you must learn its rules and survive its many dangers.

  • Narrative interludes: The story unfolds between levels through illustrated segments narrated in the second person. You are the hero.

  • Troika! inspired: The world of Fusil is based on the setting of the Troika! RPG.

Choices

  • Branching paths: Choose your route to the end of the journey. Different paths lead to unique spells, challenges, and discoveries.

  • Three ways to every goal: Every level can be completed in at least three different ways. Choose the approach that best represents your style or the one best suited to your current resources.

  • The emporium: Manage your resources. Collect coins and decide how to spend them: will you restock on plasmic cores or invest in vital upgrades?

Combat

  • Tactical twin-stick combat: Engage in deliberate combat where every shot counts. Plasmic cores are scarce—make sure your aim is true.

  • Stealth tactics: Move silently and use your blade to dispatch unaware enemies from behind.
